name: SEXTS
description:
Let's start typing!
Discover gorgeous hentai women in this typing game!
Play and unlock tons of pics of the most sublime waifus!!!
FREE TO PLAY
- The F2P version includes 10 girls for each available theme.
- There are currently 2 themes available: Witch and Primal (animal-girls). More free content in February!
- Join now and get 2 new themes in February!
- Maids will be available on February 7th for FREE!
- Another theme, voted by the community will be available February 15th (for free)!
- Vote on Steam here / on Twitter here(BonjourAI) and here(NSFW18Games) / Patreon! DLC!
- Each DLC adds 30 girls in the selected theme!
- 25% during the release week!
SUPER EASY to SUPER HARD difficulty: one word to complete a picture or 15!
Even the words to type are NSFW and translated in 8 languages! (clit, sperme, culo, vollbusige,肛交,анус,...)
Unlock all the waifus in a gorgeous and original gallery, pick your favorites to create your trio and download for your desktop! Easy as fuck!
Panic button: press F1 to instant close the game... we thought it may be useful to you...
All the waifus of this game have been made by AI experts and reworked/tweaked by AI friendly porn-artists to offer you a maximum of content without exploding our budget for this free-to-play game!
